RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 18000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THEO D'OR quickly found himself on the lead, raced on the rail, had competitors stalking just off of his side, led by a length at the half mile pole, was cued at the three eighths pole, responded to right handed crop and drew off even more, was encouraged with left handed crop and continued down the stretch, had a closing outside foe threatening but was kept on point, made it to the wire first. MO CREDO settled far off of the pace and was last by many, was allowed to find his stride, moved at the half mile pole, shifted into the three path and split horses at the three eighths pole, was hand ridden and encouraged, drifted in a step was corrected and pushed, responded well by gaining ground, drifted out a bit late but nearly caught the winner, just missing. REVERENT vied for the lead, briefly drew next to the leader, took back and stalked just off of the leaders hip, could not stay with the leader and chased into the stretch, was collared by an outside closer in the stretch, failed to switch leads and tired. MR. CROMWELL hopped at the start, settled into a stalking position in the three path, maintained that position and ran even. FREE FROM GUILT was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Theo d'Or
ENTRY.COMMENT: led, rail, advanced 1/2, bid 3/8, encouraged 1/4, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Reverent
ENTRY.OWNER: Roe Steve D and Roe Patricia L
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, 4w, stalked, chased, struggled to switch leads

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Cromwell
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, 3w, stalked, maintained position, ran even

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Credo
ENTRY.OWNER: Thompson Racing LLC (Stephen Thompson) and OM Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: far off pace, one, run, 3-4w, closed

ENTRY.NAME: Free From Guilt
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald and Pomier Chasey Deville
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never involved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE APRIL 23, 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VIM AND VIGOR raced off of the pace, traveled down the three path, launched a clean, one run, momentum building trip on the outside, circled the field through the turn, was five wide in the upper stretch and continued to close with a lot of momentum and easily took the win. SPHEROID raced from off of the pace, raced in the four path, moved at the half mile pole, followed the eventual winner around the turn and into the stretch .responded well to encouragement and closed chasing the leader, no match for winner but second best today. OPTIMISTIC stalked the pace from the two path, raced with a rival on his outside, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, advanced and challenged for the lead at the quarter pole, was quickly passed by an outside closer and then finished even. BIG POWER RED raced in the middle of hte field, stayed on the rail, advanced position at the half mile marker and had no late kick in the stretch. LORD DRAGON was off of the pace early, raced in the two path as he traveled down the backside, launched a bid a the half, improved position, shifted into the five path through the turn, then six path, seven path down the stretch, was asked and tried to close but to no avail. ROCKDALE vied for the lead, raced on the rail as he attended the pace, was challenged at the five sixteenth pole, battled into the upper stretch, then was passed by a fast closing VIM AND VIGOR and tired. MAX PANDOWDY was off in the middle of the field, raced in between horses in the three path, maintained that position through out. GET WITT GONE stalked from the three path on the out side of another rival, shifted out at the three eights pole and flattened out. THE GRAY BLUR raced from off of the pace and showed little. RIVER KAT raced in the middle of the field then faded after the half.

ENTRY.NAME: Rockdale
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, rail, pace, tired 1/4

ENTRY.NAME: Lord Dragon
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 2w, bid 1/2, improved, shifted 5w, 7w, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Spheroid
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 6w, circled, chased, second

ENTRY.NAME: Max Pandowdy
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 3-4w, between, maintained through out

ENTRY.NAME: The Gray Blur
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Vim and Vigor
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3w, bid 1/2, 5w, circled, led, drew off, best

ENTRY.NAME: Big Power Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, moved 1/2, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Optimistic
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 2w, inside, bid 3/8, gained, finished even

ENTRY.NAME: River Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Get Witt Gone
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w, stalked, outside, shifted out, 3/8, flattened out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 23, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BANKROLL vied for the lead, settled and stalked in the three path with another foe to the outside of him, launched a bid at the three eights pole, was joined by another rival at the five sixteenth pole, battled, took command at the quarter pole, was briefly threatened by an inside foe late, dug in and kept that one at bay for the win. RISKTAKER vied for the lead, raced on the rail and set the pace, saved ground through out, relinquished the lead in the turn, took a breather, came back in the stretch as he closed down the rail, threatening for the win ut could not get there today and settled for second. HALF A BUCK vied for the lead, stalked from the four path, bid at the seven sixteenth pole, was joined and matched strides with an inside rival at the five sixteenth pole, challenged for the lead as a set, could not sustain bid and chased after that. OSCAR CHOICE stalked the pace, raced in the four path, moved up in the turn, gaining ground, shifted into the two path in the upper stretch and finished flat. HEREWECOMETOGETYOU was never involved. SARAH'S VISION was off mid pack, stayed on the fence, improved position, stalked the front runners briefly and gave way. SILKY'S DANCE trailed through out.

ENTRY.NAME: Risktaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, set the pace, relinquished lead, battled late upfor2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Silky's Dance
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed through out

ENTRY.NAME: Sarah's Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, improved, stalked, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Bankroll
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, 3w, stalked, bid 3/8, challenged 5-16th, led 1/4, battled

ENTRY.NAME: Oscar Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 4w, advanced turn, shifted 2pth upper, flat

ENTRY.NAME: Herewecometogetyou
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Half a Buck
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, stalked, 4w, bid 7-16th, matched 5-16th, chased

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 39. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANAS MULE stalked the pace setter from in between horses , raced three wide, was driven through the turn and chased the leader in the stretch, was kept on point, gained ground, was determined, cleared the leader in the last few strides taking the win. BITSY'S DOUBLE DAY vied for the lead, raced on the rail, set the fractions, almost went wire to wire but was caught in the last few jumps, but still ran a game race and a nice second. DON'T BLINK TWICE raced off of the pace early, saved ground on the rail, launched a bid at the half mile pole, shifted out into the six path in the upper stretch, responded well to hand riding and encouragement, closed well and out finished the rest. BEAUCLAIRE stalked the front runners, raced in between rivals, traveled in the three path, moved at the three eights pole, drew next to the eventual winner, shifted into the two path in the stretch and tired. CHATAIN'S EAGLE was last after the start, saved ground and moved along the rail, improved position and was in touch with the field by the three eighths pole, was three wide in the turn, smartly angled back to the inside in the upper stretch, closed well. QUEENS RIOT raced five wide in the second flight of horses, was widest around the turn, struggled to switch leads and tired in the stretch. JESSOLOGY vied for the lead, raced in the two path and stalked, was on the inside of the second flight of competitors, saved ground through out but could not sustain the bid and tired late. PREPAID SPECIAL had no impact. WHEELS LIKE NALA stalked from in between horsed in the four path, lost ground in the turn and faded. TENSAS CLEAR raced from off of the pace in the three path, found her stride and started gaining ground, had momentum building and was strong into the turn, had to steady repeatedly, was through after that. BONJOOR MADEMOISEL stalked from the rail in the third flight of horses, then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Bonjoor Mademoisel
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, rail, 3rd flight, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Jessology
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, stalked, 2w, saved ground, could not sustain bid

ENTRY.NAME: Tensas Clear
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3w, strong through the turn, steadied

ENTRY.NAME: Beauclaire
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 2nd flight, btwn, 3w,

ENTRY.NAME: Chatain's Eagle
ENTRY.COMMENT: last, saved ground, bid 1/2, 3 wide, turn, angled in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Wheels Like Nala
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked. btwn, lost ground turn

ENTRY.NAME: Bitsy's Double Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, rail, pace, caught late, missed, game effort

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Blink Twice
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, rail, bid 3/8, drifted out stretch, out finished rest

ENTRY.NAME: Danas Mule
ENTRY.OWNER: Salome Robert Joseph and Salome Dana
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, between, 3w, driven, cleared late, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Queens Riot
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w, outside 2nd flight, widest trip, struggled to switch leads

ENTRY.NAME: Prepaid Special
ENTRY.COMMENT: had no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 95. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 26000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, STATE BRED OR TRIAL OR CLAIMING PRICE $30,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over On The Turf Since June 23, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 Condition eligibility preferred. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at 1 Mile and 70 Yards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IMALUCKYCHARM went wire to wire. BIRDIE CALL raced in the middle of the field, stayed on the fence through out, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, improved position through the turn, closed well in the stretch drive, got up in time for second. JUST PASSING THRU raced in the three path, launched a bid at the half mile pole, circled the field in the turn in the four path, finished even. IT'SFIFTYSHADETIME raced in the two path from near the back of the field, shifted into the four path at the three eighths pole, made up ground in the stretch and out finished the rest. JAN'S TURN TO WIN raced two wide, stalked the pace, then tired. IZATIZ traveled in the three path, stalked in a set on the outside, saved ground through the turn, had no late kick. GASTOWN trailed through out.

ENTRY.NAME: Birdie Call
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, saved ground, bid 3/8, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Gastown
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed through out

ENTRY.NAME: It'sfiftyshadetime
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2w, off pace, shifted 4 wide, 3/8, closed late

ENTRY.NAME: Just Passing Thru
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w, bid 1/2, circled 4w, even

ENTRY.NAME: Izatiz
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w, stalked, set, ran even

ENTRY.NAME: Imaluckycharm
ENTRY.COMMENT: wire to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Jan's Turn to Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2w, stalked, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 76. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For A Claiming Price Of Less Than $25,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOANA stalked the leader, raced in the four path, launched a bid at the quarter pole, drew next to the leader in the upper stretch, battled every step of the way for the last eighth of a mile, head to head until the very last jump LOANA got up in time. HALFPRICED vied for the lead, raced on the rail, set the pace, was challenged in the upper stretch, battled down the lane, just missed in the last jump. LEOPARD BAIT raced on the rail, stalked, saved ground through out, maintained position through out. MY BUTTERFLY raced six wide, was mid pack early, circled the field in the turn, but had no late kick. LIBBIES BABY raced mid pack, took the rail, angled out into the seven path in the stretch but to no avail. BELLE ELENA stalked the pace while racing three wide and faded. ILIMITADA had an awkward start and raced green. RONA VISION was off a step slow, raced three wide and showed little. TALKABOUT had a rough start and was never able to get involved. JERSEY DOLL showed brief speed and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Halfpriced
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, rail pace, battled, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Libbies Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, angled into 7pth, no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Rona Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, 3w, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Leopard Bait
ENTRY.COMMENT: rail, stalked, saved ground, maintained position

ENTRY.NAME: Belle Elena
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 3w, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Talkabout
ENTRY.COMMENT: rough start, never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Ilimitada
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, green

ENTRY.NAME: Loana
ENTRY.OWNER: Masino Racing Stable and Maller Bruce
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 4w, btwn, bid 1/4, battled stretch, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Jersey Doll
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed and faded

ENTRY.NAME: My Butterfly
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w, mid pack, circled turn, no late kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 97. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 15000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $7,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over On The Turf Since June 23, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at 1 Mile and 70 Yards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MORE ICE raced from off of the pace, stayed on the rail, moved at the last sixteenth of a mile and got up in time for the win. EASTER SNAP stalked the pace setter from the three path, chased into the stretch, finally cleared the early leader but was quickly caught by a foe on the inside and had to settle for second place. FREEDOM FACTOR was mid pack early, raced on the rail, shifted four wide in the upper stretch was able to get up for third. MEN OF KYLE raced mid pack, in the two path, was between horses in the second flight, shifted out into the eight path in the upper stretch and finished even. CLIFF DIVER stalked the pace from the four path in between foes, maintained position and had no late kick. DON'TASK DON'TTELL vied for the lead, raced on the rail while he was in control of the pace then tired. DIAL IN FOR LUTE raced in the middle of the field in the two path but had no finish. TURN ON THE MAGIC raced from off of the pace, was four wide and maintained position through out. EXETER off slow, showed little. JOHNNYSJOURNEY had no impact. GUITAR SLIM was never involved. DRIED PEPPER brief speed, faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Guitar Slim
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never involved

ENTRY.NAME: More Ice
ENTRY.OWNER: Tri-Star Racing LLC and Foster Cheryl
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, rail, saved ground, moved 16th, cleared, up

ENTRY.NAME: Freedom Factor
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, improved, shifted 4 wide, stretch, up for third

ENTRY.NAME: Cliff Diver
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 4w, btwn, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Dial in for Lute
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 2w, no finish

ENTRY.NAME: Men of Kyle
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 2w, 2nd fight, btwn, shifted 8 wide, upper, even

ENTRY.NAME: Turn On the Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 4w, maintained position

ENTRY.NAME: Johnnysjourney
ENTRY.COMMENT: had no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Exeter
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Easter Snap
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 3w, chased, led, was cleared, settled for second

ENTRY.NAME: Don'task Don'ttell
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, rail ,tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, faded
